summary: This is an email chain from December 2019 regarding the pre-seizure package for Jeffrey Epstein's New York City property at 9 East 71st Street. The correspondence discusses sharing property-related documents that are not considered grand jury material and notes the property's appraisal value and recommendation for seizure by the U.S. Marshals Service.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case USA v. Jeffrey Epstein and the owner of the property at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY, which is recommended for seizure.

events.title: Pre-Seizure Package Prepared for Epstein's NY Property
events.description: The U.S. Marshals Service - DNY Asset Forfeiture Unit prepared a pre-seizure package for the property at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY, related to the case USA v. Jeffrey Epstein, recommending its seizure.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's New York City property at 9 East 71st Street was appraised at $81 million with no record of a mortgage.
The U.S. Marshals Service recommended the seizure of the property due to positive net equity.

The email chain indicates that documents pertaining to this property were not considered Rule 6/Grand Jury material and could be shared, while materials on other Epstein properties were still under review regarding their method of obtainment.
